Metadata.Title: Keep Unencrypted Data Close to the Algorithm
Metadata.DirectLink: Keep Unencrypted Data Close to the Algorithm
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application 

What to Do

When passing plaintext to an algorithm, do not obtain the data until you are ready to use it, and store it in as few variables as possible.

How

When passing plaintext to an algorithm, do not obtain the data until you are ready to use it, and store it in as few variables as possible.
